title: Patching Issues with Client
body:
So, is there any particular reason that, every time an update goes live, I need to re-open my client 5-7 times because the patch always freezes at about .1 MB away from completion, and I have to close the patch window to get it to load again? My internet connection stays strong the entire time, I've checked.

Is this normal for it to do this? Because it seems kind of buggy to me.

replies.body: You might have an anti-virus or security setting getting in the way and blocking game files from updating.  See if the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide can get this fixed up for you.
